course.title: Neural Coding and Perception of Sound
course.meeting_text: M., W., 9:30–11:30, Occasional lab on Friday
course.faculty_text: Bertrand Delgutte (Medical School), M. Christian Brown (Medical School), John J. Guinan (Medical School), Jennifer R. Melcher (Medical School), and Daniel B. Polley (Medical School)
course.description: Neural structures and mechanisms mediating the detection, localization and recognition of sounds. General principles are conveyed by theme discussions of auditory masking, sound localization, musical pitch, cochlear implants, cortical plasticity and auditory scene analysis.
course.prerequisites: Neurobiology 200 or Permission of the instructor.
